body_html:
I don't think we do at the moment. Bazel can only tell apart which platform we are targeting to build.
We might be able to write some skylark magic to do the detection.
But until then, this will quickly unblock AMD CPU owners.

body:
I don't think we do at the moment. Bazel can only tell apart which platform we are targeting to build.
We might be able to write some skylark magic to do the detection.
But until then, this will quickly unblock AMD CPU owners.
